participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Patient, nurturing, and passionate about nature and literature.
participant_1.background: i am partly deaf. i'm a museum tour guide. i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy.

content.text: i tend my rose garden and read books   i am deaf in one ear
